description: Server-side entry point for handling HTTP requests in a Remix application, managing server-side rendering and bot detection.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects bots, and delegates to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming HTML response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming HTML response.
